articles.author: Nancy Armour
articles.title: Olympic champion Suni Lee's rough Winter Cup day is reminder of what makes her a great - USA TODAY
articles.description: Suni Lee fell twice on uneven bars, including on skill she hopes to have named for her, and once on balance beam at Winter Cup.
articles.content:
LOUISVILLE, Ky. In gymnastics, as in life, things arent perfect.
There are going to be falls. There are going to be struggles. There are going to be days that dont turn out as youd hope. Its how it … [+4095 chars]
